name: Hot Water (Henrik2k)
description:
Hot Water is a puzzle platformer in which you have to control two characters in order to reach the end. Elements such as jumppads and boxes can help you on your way to the end. The Player has to swich between a water and a fire character to get past different obstacles. The solidarity between them is strong and you can lead these two completely different natures through the puzzle.

Creating this game was really fun and challenging and defenitely cept us trapped and safe in our homes ;)

Have fun playing and if you have questions or like the game just leave us a comment.
